text:
Booking.com - ONSITE

Booking.com, the largest OTA on the planet, is the flagship brand of the $67B Priceline group (NASDAQ:PCLN). The interview process generally includes a HackerRank, 1 or 2 phone screens and several onsite interviews depending on the position. Booking.com offers generous relocation packages for all of the tech positions.
